item.title: Sherry add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Sherry add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Sherry add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Sherry add a quote by Arthur Bloch
item.description: "Don't force it; get a bigger hammer." -- Arthur Bloch

item.title: Sherry add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Sherry add a quote by Miss Piggy
item.description: "Beauty is in the eye of the beholder and it may be necessary from time to time to give a stupid or misinformed beholder a black eye." -- Miss Piggy

item.title: Sherry add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Sherry add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Sherry add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "The Guide says there is an art to flying", said Ford, "or rather a knack. The knack lies in learning how to throw yourself at the ground and miss." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Sherry add a quote by Charles J. Sykes
item.description: "Be nice to nerds. You may end up working for them. We all could." -- Charles J. Sykes

item.title: Sherry add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "Reality continues to ruin my life." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Sherry add a quote by Charles Lamb
item.description: "I always arrive late at the office, but I make up for it by leaving early." -- Charles Lamb

item.title: Sherry add a quote by Scott Adams
item.description: "I love you like a fat kid loves cake!" -- Scott Adams

item.title: Sherry add a quote by W.C. Fields
item.description: "If at first you don't succeed, try, try again. Then quit. No use being a damn fool about it." -- W.C. Fields

item.title: Sherry add a quote by Steven Wright
item.description: "Right now I’m having amnesia and déjà vu at the same time. I think I’ve forgotten this before." -- Steven Wright

item.title: Sherry add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "The reason I talk to myself is because I’m the only one whose answers I accept." -- George Carlin

item.title: Sherry add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "Everyone looks retarded once you set your mind to it." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Sherry add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Sherry add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Sherry add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Sherry add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Women and cats will do as they please, and men and dogs should relax and get used to the idea." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Sherry add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "Folks are usually about as happy as they make their minds up to be." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Sherry add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Have you ever been in love? Horrible isn't it? It makes you so vulnerable. It opens your chest and it opens up your heart and it means that someone can get inside you and mess you up." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Sherry add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Fairy tales are more than true: not because they tell us that dragons exist, but because they tell us that dragons can be beaten." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Sherry add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "Listen to the mustn'ts, child. Listen to the don'ts. Listen to the shouldn'ts, the impossibles, the won'ts. Listen to the never haves, then listen close to me... Anything can happen, child. Anything can be." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Sherry add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I do not know any other way of loving but this, in which there is no I or you, so intimate that your hand upon my chest is my hand, so intimate that when I fall asleep your eyes close." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Sherry add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "We accept the love we think we deserve." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Sherry add a quote by Laurel Thatcher Ulrich
item.description: "Well-behaved women seldom make history." -- Laurel Thatcher Ulrich

item.title: Sherry add a quote by Mother Theresa
item.description: "I know God won't give me anything I can't handle. I just wish he didn't trust me so much." -- Mother Theresa

item.title: Sherry add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I believe that everything happens for a reason. People change so that you can learn to let go, things go wrong so that you appreciate them when they're right, you believe lies so you eventually learn to trust no one but yourself, and sometimes good things fall apart so better things can fall together." -- Marilyn Monroe
